title: Stocks Drop As Fed Leaves Investors Uncertain About Rates
description: Jerome H. Powell, the Federal Reserve chair, said the central bank “still has a ways to go” before it will be done raising interest rates, and that rates may go higher than previously anticipated.
dc:creator: Joe Rennison
media:description: Jerome H. Powell, the Federal Reserve chair, and his colleagues have been rapidly increasing interest rates this year to try to wrestle inflation lower.
